#### Workshop 9th July 2025
Venue: Wills Memorial Building **3.32**, BS8 1RJ [///rich.bossy.square](https://what3words.com/rich.bossy.square)

Data science Artificial Intelligence (AI) are revolutionising medical research and clinical practice. Congenital heart disease (CHD) is an exceptionally complicated condition involving developmental biology, genetic and environmental factors, anatomical complexity, and hemodynamics. This workshop will explore how to harness AI and multimodal data to inform early detection, more accurate diagnosis, and personalised treatment strategies.
